about_the_game:
Bobls is a bouncy precision platformer. Blow and bounce on bubbles as you collect magical gemstones in hundreds of fun and challenging levels. Play solo or join forces with Mousr in the co-op campaign and carefully coordinate your moves as you solve mind-bending puzzles. The online universe also features an intuitive level editor for you to create and share levels with the world!
 

 

Bubbles play a central role in your adventure. Use them to maneuver difficult terrain, collect useful items, and press inaccessible buttons as you bounce through levels. Slide down slopes at thrilling speeds and build combos as you venture through the increasingly challenging worlds.

 

 

Play as Bobls and Mousr in the local co-op campaign which features an entire new set of dedicated levels. The teamwork dynamic shifts mechanics in interesting new ways and puts your relationship to the test. Blow bubbles for the other player to bounce on and toggle platforms for each other, or die trying.

 

 

Let your imagination run wild in the powerful level editor and share your creations with the rest of the world. The editor lets you play with easy-to-use tools that make your ideas come to life in no time. Discover new levels created by players through the online hub, the Level Galaxy. Race against replay ghosts and perfect your moves to make your way to the top of the leaderboard!

 

 

  • Single-player campaign with multiple worlds and hundreds of levels

  • Separate two-player local co-op campaign tailored to teamwork

  • Play, create, and share your own levels in the social Online Universe

  • Replayability modes - Complete the campaigns again with challenging twists

  • A pixel perfect world with precise platforming mechanics

  • Retro aesthetics but modern game design principles

  • Original, head-banging soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 / AMD FX 6120
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti / Nvidia GT 750M / Radeon HD5850 or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7600 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / AMD RX 560 or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11
